FERNANDO – ELVIN NIHAL. At rest with Jesus. Beloved husband of Amitha Malanee Fernando – Retired teacher,​ Methodist College,​ Colombo 3 . Dearest father of Nimali,​ Nishantha and Nilmini. Dearest father-in-law of Theja,​ Dimithri and Dimuth. Precious grandfather of Nimesh,​ Niyodhya,​ Nithika,​ Thidal,​ Dishan,​ Nivedhya,​ Nethuli and Wishmi. Cortege leaves residence : 21,​ ‘Elson Cottage’,​ 4th Lane,​ Rawathawatte,​ Moratuwa at 3.00 p.m on Saturday,​ the 9th of March 2024 and thereafter for Service and burial at 4.00 p.m,​ at Holy Emmanuel Church,​ Moratuwa.
